name: Mexican Vegan Lentil Soup
description: Mexican Vegan Lentil Soup, an easy recipe for healthy, comforting, spicy lentils with tomato, onion, garlic, and serrano chiles
recipeIngredient: 1/2 lb. (1 1/4 cups) Brown or green lentils, cleaned, rinsed

recipeInstructions.text: Place your lentils in a medium sauce pot, add water, onion, and bay leaf. Bring to a low simmer and let cook for 20 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Place your lentils in a medium sauce pot, add water, onion, and bay leaf. Bring to a low simmer and let cook for 20 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: While the lentils are cooking, make a small incision using a sharp knife on the tip of the serrano pepper (like an X). Set a large sauté pan to medium heat and add the diced onion. Let the onions cook until translucent and tender,  about 4-5 minutes. If it begins to stick to the pan add a little bit of water.
recipeInstructions.name: While the lentils are cooking, make a small incision using a sharp knife on the tip of the serrano pepper (like an X). Set a large sauté pan to medium heat and add the diced onion. Let the onions cook until translucent and tender,  about 4-5 minutes. If it begins to stick to the pan add a little bit of water.

recipeInstructions.text: Add garlic and cook for 1 more minute. Add diced tomato and chile serrano (whole) and cook until the tomato has broken down, about 6 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add garlic and cook for 1 more minute. Add diced tomato and chile serrano (whole) and cook until the tomato has broken down, about 6 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the ½ onion and bay leaf from the lentils, and add the vegetable mixture, and cilantro sprigs to the pot. Simmer slowly for about 8 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove the ½ onion and bay leaf from the lentils, and add the vegetable mixture, and cilantro sprigs to the pot. Simmer slowly for about 8 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the cilantro sprigs, and serrano pepper. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove the cilantro sprigs, and serrano pepper. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the chile serrano into rounds and add it back to the pot to make the soup extra spicy. (optional)
